__e: Seems those people up at the houmfort... won't stop drumming and dancing till they've gotten Jessica back... and finished their ritual tests, something of that sort.
What have I contributed except... some fair-to-middling drumming, and lead Savitar directly to Iris.
If you insist, beat your drum, but mind your own business.
- What's a murder list? - Well, we, er we round 'em up, sir, when there's a murder.
Start by rounding up everybody we can find.
